QuestData.Title: The Ancients are With Us
QuestData.Description: Nemesis... destroyed.$B$BI feel rejuvenated.$BPowerful.$BAwakened.$B$BTell Ysera my strength is hers.$B$BThe Twilight's Hammer will fall.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Ysera at Nordrassil in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ysera at Nordrassil in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: By relieving Tortolla of his final burdens you have acquired for us a formidable ally... and the final piece of the puzzle.$B$BSteel yourself, $n. The most difficult part of our journey is to begin.$B$BWe will bring the fight to their stronghold.
